author: lundblad
msg: Fix issue #2262: Remove expired locks in FSFS during commits.
Also, make expiration work for svn_fs_get_locks and recursive lock checks.
(get_lock): Remove commented-out code to auto-expire locks when we don't
Don't report an expired lock, but instead remove such locks if
updated.  Instead of calling svn_fs_fs__get_locks, call the digest walker
that the caller holds the FS write lock.
lock expiration is correctly handled by the recursive svn_fs_get_locks()

author: epg
